title: SIP-5 Add SWRV-ETH LP Pool
body:
Swerve Finance (https://swerve.fi/) is a 100% community-owned fork of Curve with fairer tokenomics for Liquidity Providers, and a max supply of 33M SWRV. More details can be found on the website.

SWRV Contract Address: 0xb8baa0e4287890a5f79863ab62b7f175cecbd433

As of now, they have $400M+ locked in the protocol, just a few hours after launch.

This proposal seeks to add SWRV-ETH LP pool which would help create more liquidity for SWRV-ETH pool (currently it's quite low) and reward LPs with the same initial reward weight of 0.2x as was assigned for the Pools added in SIP-4.
author: 0x6D3E136698beFEe231cD2E4E94bE0105D62FA01F
